Question & Options:
What roles do Dolly and Ram play in the relationship between Ram and Sona in *Ramaiya Vastavaiya*?
Options:
A. A) Dolly is Ram's cousin who opposes his relationship with Sona.
B. B) Dolly and her father attempt to sabotage Ram's relationship with Sona.
C. C) Ram has a romantic relationship with Sona.
D. D) All of the above

What are the roles of the characters in the relationship dynamics of 'Ramaiya Vastavaiya'?
Options:
A. A) Sona Singh is in love with Ram Kapoor.
B. B) Dolly is Ram's cousin and opposes his relationship with Sona.
C. C) Ram's mother supports Ram's relationship with Sona.
D. D) Dolly attempts to sabotage Ram's relationship with Sona.
Correct Answer: A) Sona Singh is in love with Ram Kapoor., B) Dolly is Ram's cousin and opposes his relationship with Sona., D) Dolly attempts to sabotage Ram's relationship with Sona.
